item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life After Islam with Zahraa (SeedsOfDoubt3)

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life After Islam with Zahraa (SeedsOfDoubt3).mp3

item.description:
Zahraa is a 27yo French Canadian Lebanese, that escaped both an abusive family and marriage and enforced religion and is now living with her son and kicking ass.
First of our series, Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.
Follow her on twitter: https://twitter.com/SeedsOfDoubt3
Support my passion and drive by becoming a patron, patreon account: https://www.patreon.com/zarakay
Follow me on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3HZj_ebQWk90iaczhSvuCA Twitter: https://twitter.com/zarakayk Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zara.kayk Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zarakayk
Faithless Hijabi: https://www.facebook.com/faithlesshijabi . ..
#ExMuslim #LifeAfterIslam #Islam

item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life after Islam #1: Embracing losing your faith

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life after Islam Embracing losing your faith.mp3

item.description:
Leaving Islam, knowing so much is at stake with your family, friends, environment and even your life is not one of the easiest journey to take.
ExMuslim Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/exmuslim
Follow me on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3HZj_ebQWk90iaczhSvuCA Twitter: https://twitter.com/zarakayk Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/zara.kayk Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zarakayk
Faithless Hijabi: https://www.facebook.com/faithlesshijabi
Support my passion and drive by becoming a patron, patreon account: https://www.patreon.com/zarakay
#ExMuslim #Islam #Atheist #Muslim #ZaraKay #MentalHealth #LifeAfterIslam #LeavingIslam

item.author: Zara Kay
item.itunes:author: Zara Kay
item.title: Life After Islam with Little Devil

enclosure.url: https://faithlesshijabi.github.io/Podcast/audio/Zara Kay - Life After Islam with Little Devil.mp3

item.description:
And our guest is ü•Å ü•Å ü•Å our beloved Little Devil from twitter, from a Tablighi Jamaat & Salafi background, LD has braved through escaping her abusive home and what was a near death experience with her family to now live as an independent free woman!
Life After Islam is a series dedicated to speaking with ExMuslims about their experiences, their views, advice to younger ExMuslims and just having a drink while we engage in insightful conversations with our growing community of ExMuslims.
Follow her on twitter: https://twitter.com/amethystlyy
